data.title: About me
data.text:
He is the Founder and CEO of Alma World Limited, South Asian Chamber of Commerce & Industry, World Book of Records Limited - UK, USA, Canada, Switzerland, India, Mauritius, Australia and New Zealand, Federation of Commonwealth Countries , Quality Certification Limited, UK, Alma Schools of London, Asiatic Liberal Multifarious Association (ALMA), All India IT Association, NGOs Association of India, International Brahmin Parliament, INDO-UK Intellectuals Forum and associated with International Court of Justice, The Bar Association of India, All India Law Federation, Indian Red Cross Society and State Bar Council of Madhya Pradesh. A fleet of successful business, he keeps himself dedicated to practice of Supreme Court of India. He is legal expert and specialized in Cyber Laws and Security. He has been deeply active in promoting the cause of social, cultural, education, environment, national integration, universal peace through thousands of activities for 30 years. Besides, he went ahead to strengthen democratic values through journalistic approach being a Chief Editor of Alma Times, Alma Today, WBRLive and Brahmin World.

He has excelled in political, social, cultural, educational, environmental, economic and humanitarian causes and upliftment. A firm believer in the philosophy of Swami Vivekananda and Mahatma Gandhi, He hails from Allahabad, Uttar Pradesh and was born on 6th December, 1973. He completed his formal education from Uttar Pradesh and Madhya Pradesh in India. His determination and never-say-die attitude towards life has sculpted him in the mould of one of the best humanitarian visionaries, who never leave any stone unturned to go that extra mile to touch hearts through his altruistic self. He is the man who has successfully made his mark and has left inspirational footsteps to be followed in his journey from Allahabad to London; a journey which was grueling enough to wreck one's spirit but for him, it was a path to evolve. He develops and promotes business in all continents.

For last 20 Years, under his pioneering guidance many national and international awards ceremony and honour functions have been taken concreted success with applause. He has kept the social welfare as the first priority and has thus achieved a holistic growth in every aspect of life. His charisma is never brightened by his goodness of power but the power of goodness. A visionary, who also is a dreamer and dreams beyond limits for others as well, is apt at clicking bonds with almost every age group and thus possess brilliant leadership qualities. Be it decision making, inquisitive nature or efforts to empower women and youth, he has stood strong as an epitome of perfection.
